creditline: Gift of Richard L. Simmons in memory of Roberta Grodberg Simmons
description: brown and gold with rust threads; geometric patterns; four main lengthwise sections separated by brown and rust stripes; yellow beads on all sides; five metal bells on each end attached to beads

title: Skirt
